sneakers.name: Nike Air Max 90
sneakers.description: The Nike Air Max 90 is a classic sneaker known for its iconic design and comfortable cushioning. Featuring a white, black, and university red colorway, this version of the Air Max 90 is perfect for everyday wear.

sneakers.name: Adidas Ultraboost
sneakers.description: The Adidas Ultraboost is a popular running shoe known for its responsive cushioning and stylish design. This version features a core black and cloud white colorway, making it versatile for both running and casual wear.

sneakers.name: Jordan 1 Retro High
sneakers.description: The Jordan 1 Retro High is an iconic basketball shoe worn by Michael Jordan during his rookie season. Featuring a classic black and red colorway, this sneaker pays homage to Jordan's Chicago Bulls days.
